Html:
hi there after some time i playing wow again so i decided to using rawr for searching the best items for my char.

i using Rawr WPF 4.3.8 for my arcane mage, iam a litte bit confused now because rawr tells me that the tier 11 firelord gear (372) are better then the most new tier 13 (410) items in following slots: head, shoulders, chest, hands.

is that that a bug or is that for real? how can a 372 item better than a 410 item in the most slots? is the set bonus of tier 11 so much better then the new ones?

thx for your help.
